isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - UNINSTALLING ACOM: GENERAL

svcproc.title: UNINSTALLING ACOM: GENERAL
svcproc.para: The Uninstall feature lets you quickly remove all folders (Windows 95) or program groups (Windows 3.X) and files installed to your hard disk by the ACom installer. This will not affect your ACom publications, or any other file added after installation (you can manually remove those after uninstalling ACom). However, the uninstall program will not be able to remove a folder that contains files added after installation; the uninstall program will alert you if it encounters a file it cannot uninstall.

step1.para: Exit the ACom for Windows program.

For Windows 95, double click the Uninstall icon on the desktop ( Figure 19). Click Yes in the confirmation box that appears and the uninstall procedure is started. Upon completion click Ok or Finish and the uninstall is complete.

For Windows 3.X, maximize the ACom For Windows Program Group icon then double click the Uninstall icon. Click Yes in the confirmation box that appears and the uninstall procedure is started. Upon completion click OK or Finish and the uninstall is complete.
